name: Flowers by POWGI
description:
A brand new word puzzle - exclusive to POWGI! Place pairs of letters on the petals to make six-letter words through the middle of the flower.

Flowers by POWGI contains 120 hand-crafted puzzles with a gentle learning curve, and includes a handful of bad puns for free.

With all the polish you'd expect from a POWGI app, Flowers features a no-fluff, easy-to-use interface that puts the focus firmly on the puzzle content.

Please email support@powgi.com if you need assistance. POWGI has excellent support and we'd rather help you than get a bad review.
